creator: lance@nuserve.com
text:
The 'jspc' ant task ignores the package spec when it generates a web.xml 
fragment via the 'webinc=' parameter.  All of the servlet specifications in the 
fragment file have no package tree.

As a side effect of this (I think), our JSP page 'Startup.jsp' collides with 
org.apache.jsp.Startup, and JBoss has an exception when loading our app's dot-
ear file.

Any of this make sense?

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This is a question for the tomcat-user mailing list rather than bugzilla which
probably explains why this bug report has not been responded to for so long.

In short:
- use the package="foo.bar.whatever" option for your jasper2 task
- this works for me

Any further questions on this topic should be directed to the tomcat-user
mailing list.
